data.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018)
data.summary: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

data.title: Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
data.summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

data.title: Untitled Avengers Movie (2019)
data.summary: The plot is yet to be revealed. Will be the fourth installment of the 'Avengers' series.

data.title: Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
data.summary: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

data.title: Aquaman (2018)
data.summary: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

data.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
data.summary: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

data.title: Slice (2018)
data.summary: When a pizza delivery driver is murdered on the job, the city searches for someone to blame: ghosts? drug dealers? a disgraced werewolf?

data.title: Justice League (2017)
data.summary: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001)
data.summary: An orphaned boy enrolled in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

data.title: Suspiria (2018)
data.summary: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.

data.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)
data.summary: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

data.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018)
data.summary: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series set in J.K. Rowling's Wizarding World featuring the adventures of magizoologist Newt Scamander.

data.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi (2017)
data.summary: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

data.title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms (2018)
data.summary: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

data.title: Tomb Raider (2018)
data.summary: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared.

data.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
data.summary: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

data.title: Suicide Squad (2016)
data.summary: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

data.title: The Little Mermaid (2018)
data.summary: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.

data.title: The Mummy (1999)
data.summary: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

data.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
data.summary: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

data.title: The Mummy (2017)
data.summary: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

data.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
data.summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)
data.summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

data.title: Hellboy (2019)
data.summary: Based on the graphic novels by Mike Mignola, Hellboy, caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

data.title: Beauty and the Beast (2017)
data.summary: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

data.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019)
data.summary: The next chapter in Warner Bros. Pictures' and Legendary Pictures' cinematic MonsterVerse: an epic action adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history.

data.title: Shazam! (2019)
data.summary: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson's case, by shouting out one word - SHAZAM! - this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult superhero Shazam.

data.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016)
data.summary: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

data.title: Doctor Strange (2016)
data.summary: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

data.title: Mary Poppins Returns (2018)
data.summary: In Depression-era London, a now-grown Jane and Michael Banks, along with Michael's three children, are visited by the enigmatic Mary Poppins following a personal loss. Through her unique ...                See full summary »

data.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
data.summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them obtaining its powers.

data.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016)
data.summary: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

data.title: I Kill Giants (2017)
data.summary: Barbara Thorson struggles through life by escaping into a fantasy life of magic and monsters.

data.title: Man of Steel (2013)
data.summary: Clark Kent, one of the last of an extinguished race disguised as an unremarkable human, is forced to reveal his identity when Earth is invaded by an army of survivors who threaten to bring the planet to the brink of destruction.

data.title: Wonder Woman 1984 (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown. A sequel to the 2017 super hero film 'Wonder Woman'.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005)
data.summary: A young wizard finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

data.title: Warcraft (2016)
data.summary: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

data.title: Hocus Pocus (1993)
data.summary: After three centuries, three witch sisters are resurrected in Salem, Massachusetts on Halloween night, and it is up to two teenagers, a young girl, and an immortal cat to put an end to their reign of terror once and for all.

data.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales (2017)
data.summary: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

data.title: Avatar (2009)
data.summary: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

data.title: The Green Mile (1999)
data.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

data.title: The Princess Bride (1987)
data.summary: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

data.title: Twilight (I) (2008)
data.summary: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004)
data.summary: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

data.title: Ghostbusters (2016)
data.summary: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

data.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
data.summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

data.title: Halloween (2007)
data.summary: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002)
data.summary: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.

data.title: Stephanie (I) (2017)
data.summary: After a mysterious global crisis, a young girl is left alone to hide from a malevolent power that stalks her home. Her parents eventually return and the struggle begins to save their daughter.

data.title: Bleach (2018)
data.summary: Ichigo Kurosaki is a High School student, living in Karakura town. He is able to see ghosts, as well as hollows. Later, he meets up with Rukia Kuchiki, a Death God or Soul Reaper (Shinigami...                See full summary »

data.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets (2017)
data.summary: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

data.title: Star Wars (1977)
data.summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

data.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween (2018)
data.summary: Halloween comes to life in a comedy adventure based on R.L. Stine's 400-million-selling series of books.

data.title: The Mummy Returns (2001)
data.summary: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

data.title: Sucker Punch (2011)
data.summary: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather, retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, envisioning a plan to help her escape.

data.title: Star Wars: Episode IX (2019)
data.summary: The conclusion of the new 'Star Wars' trilogy.

data.title: Thor (2011)
data.summary: The powerful, but arrogant god Thor, is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

data.title: Beastly (2011)
data.summary: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

data.title: A Wrinkle in Time (2018)
data.summary: After the disappearance of her scientist father, three peculiar beings send Meg, her brother, and her friend to space in order to find him.

data.title: Aladdin (2019)
data.summary: A live-action retelling of the 1992 Disney film of the same name.

data.title: Stardust (2007)
data.summary: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

data.title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword (2017)
data.summary: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

data.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens (2015)
data.summary: Three decades after the Empire's defeat, a new threat arises in the militant First Order. Stormtrooper defector Finn and the scavenger Rey are caught up in the Resistance's search for the missing Luke Skywalker.

data.title: Cinderella (I) (2015)
data.summary: When her father unexpectedly passes away, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming step-sisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

data.title: Bright (I) (2017)
data.summary: Set in a world where fantasy creatures live side by side with humans. A human cop is forced to work with an Orc to find a weapon everyone is prepared to kill for.

data.title: The Batman
data.summary: The plot is unknown.

data.title: Mortal Engines (2018)
data.summary: Many years after the "Sixty Minute War," cities survive a now desolate Earth by moving around on giant wheels attacking and devouring smaller towns to replenish their resources.

data.title: The Endless (I) (2017)
data.summary: Two brothers return to the cult they fled from years ago to discover that the group's beliefs may be more sane than they once thought.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007)
data.summary: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

data.title: Sorry to Bother You (2018)
data.summary: In an alternate present-day version of Oakland, telemarketer Cassius Green discovers a magical key to professional success, propelling him into a universe of greed.

data.title: Beetlejuice (1988)
data.summary: When a recently-deceased ghost couple find their now-vacant home invaded by an obnoxious family, they hire a sleazy ghost who gets rid of humans to help them.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)
data.summary: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

data.title: Tomorrowland (2015)
data.summary: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

data.title: The Age of Adaline (2015)
data.summary: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

data.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang (1968)
data.summary: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

data.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2 (2012)
data.summary: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

data.title: About Time (I) (2013)
data.summary: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

data.title: Kong: Skull Island (2017)
data.summary: A team of scientists explore an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

data.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005)
data.summary: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

data.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor (2008)
data.summary: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

data.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003)
data.summary: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

data.title: Winchester (2018)
data.summary: Ensconced in her sprawling California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

data.title: The Mask (1994)
data.summary: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

data.title: This Is the End (2013)
data.summary: 6 Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only will have to face with the apocalypse, but with themselves.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.
